Package gw.cc.exposure.entity

Interface Incident

All Superinterfaces:
com.guidewire.cc.domain.claim.ClaimContactRoleOwner, ClaimContactRoleOwner, com.guidewire.cc.domain.contact.EntityContactRoleOwner
All Known Subinterfaces:
BaggageIncident, DwellingIncident, FixedPropertyIncident, InjuryIncident, LivingExpensesIncident, MobilePropertyIncident, OtherStructureIncident, PropertyContentsIncident, PropertyIncident, TripIncident, VehicleIncident
public interface Incident extends com.guidewire.cc.domain.claim.ClaimContactRoleOwner
Incident Report of damage related to a claim.

  • Method Details

    • isUsedByExposure

      boolean isUsedByExposure()
      Returns whether this incident is used by at least one exposure.
      Returns:
      true if the incident is used by an exposure, false otherwise

    • isBetterForNewExposure

      boolean isBetterForNewExposure(Incident other)
      Returns whether this incident is better than the given one as the first choice for a new exposure Default implementation checks which of the incidents is used by an exposure (unused is better) then backs off to display name ordering. The implementation can assume that the other incident provided as its argument is exactly the same subtype of incident as this incident (e.g. if this is a VehicleIncident then the "other" parameter will also be a VehicleIncident) it is permissible to throw a ClassCastException if this is not true.
      Parameters:
      other - second incident to test whether this incident is better than it
      Returns:
      true if this incident is better than the given one

    • getAllowedContactRolesForEntity

      List<ContactRole> getAllowedContactRolesForEntity()
      Returns all allowed contact roles for an incident
      Specified by:
      getAllowedContactRolesForEntity in interface com.guidewire.cc.domain.claim.ClaimContactRoleOwner
      Returns:
      a list of allowed contact roles for an incident

    • getOrderedContentItemLine

      AssessmentContentItem[] getOrderedContentItemLine()
      Returns the ContentItemLine ordered by the IncidentOrder value.
      Returns:
      the sorted ContentItemLine array

    • getClaimCurrency

      Currency getClaimCurrency()
      Gets this Incident's claim's currency.
      Returns:
      the current Currency for the claim to which this incident belongs. Returns NULL if the claim is currently unreachable (if, for example, the necessary entity connections have not yet been made).

    • onServiceRequestQuoteAdded

      void onServiceRequestQuoteAdded(ServiceRequest sr)

    • createExposure

      Exposure createExposure(CoverageType coverageType, CoverageSubtype coverageSubtype)
      Creates an exposure for the incident for the given coverageType and coverageSubtype. 
      If it already exists then it does nothing.
      If the claim state is not ClaimState.TC_OPEN or ClaimState.TC_DRAFT then it does nothing.
      If the claim state is not ClaimState.TC_OPEN then the new exposure gets persisted.
      Parameters:
      coverageType - the exposure coverage type
      coverageSubtype - the exposure coverage sub type
      Returns:
      the newly created exposure, or null
